mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop (admin, name, address, phone, classification, number, description) VALUES(#{admin}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{classification}, #{number}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchword}, '%')

SELECT shop.id, shop.admin, shop.name, shop.address, shop.phone, shop.classification, shop.number, shop.description FROM shop, (SELECT shop_category.id, shop_category.shop, shop_category.code FROM category, shop_category WHERE name LIKE #{category} AND category.code = shop_category.id) AS ctgr WHERE shop.id = ctgr.shop AND shop.id IN (SELECT shop FROM product WHERE price BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice} AND address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%'))
